xAxis!/yAxis!

The xAxis! and yAxis! functions are just convenience functions around the Axis type, so that end-users donâ€™t need to reference ec.yAxis or ec.xAxis directly (though, nothing prevents users modifying the EChart chart instance).

Log Scale on Axis

using ECharts
x = 1:10
y = [2^x for x in x]
l = line(x, y)
yAxis!(l, _type = "log", scale = true)

(Re-)Scale axis to not include zero

using ECharts
data = [850, 740, 900, 1070, 930, 850, 950, 980, 980, 880, 1000, 980, 930, 650, 760, 810, 1000, 1000, 960, 960]
b = box(data, horizontal = true)
xAxis!(b, scale = true)
